# Interface Subgraph

This interface was referenced by `InworldBasicConfigurationSchema`'s JSON-Schema via the `definition` "Subgraph".

interface Subgraph {  
edges?: [Edge](./graph_dsl_graph_config_schema.Edge)[];  
end_nodes?: [string];  
id: string;  
nodes?: [[Node](/types/graph_dsl_graph_config_schema.Node), ...[Node](/types/graph_dsl_graph_config_schema.Node)[]];  
parameters?: {  
name: string;  
type: "string" | "number" | "boolean" | "integer";  
}[];  
start_nodes?: [string];  
}

List of edges that connect nodes

### `Optional`end_nodes

end_nodes?: [string]

List of node IDs that serve as exit points of the graph

Unique identifier of the graph

### `Optional`parameters

parameters?: { name: string; type: "string" | "number" | "boolean" | "integer" }[]
